title: Asteroids
description: In this two part coding challenge, I use the p5.js library to create my own version of the classic Atari video game Asteroids!

timestamps.title: Introducing today's topic: coding the classic Atari game Asteroids
Create a Ship object
Write a function to turn the ship
Move the ship by adding velocity and acceleration vectors
Deal with the edges of the screen
Create an array of asteroids
Add push and pop to save the ship's heading
Use polar to cartesian coordinates to get the vertices on the asteroids
Offset the vertices by a random value to create jagged asteroids
Move the asteroids
Asteroids - Part 2
Add a Laser object
Add collision detection
Add a breakup function
Loop through the asteroids backwards
Use concat to add the new asteroids to the array
Remove the asteroids if their size falls below a threshold value
Check if the ship hits the asteroid
Possibilities for variations
Remove lasers that are offscreen
